tool_description: Performs AC current calibration across frequency ranges, testing True RMS current measurement accuracy and frequency response of current input circuits.

current_levels.description: Current levels as percentage of full scale

error_messages: AC current source limitation: Cannot generate required AC current at specified frequency.
Frequency response degradation: Significant accuracy loss at higher frequencies detected.
Current transformer saturation: Current transformer shows saturation effects at high current levels.
Phase shift error: Excessive phase shift between reference and DUT current measurements.
RMS conversion error: True RMS measurement shows significant errors with distorted waveforms.
Thermal drift detected: Current measurements drifting due to thermal effects in current shunts.
usage: Define AC current ranges, test frequencies, and current levels. Tool generates precise AC currents and evaluates DUT AC current measurement performance across frequency spectrum.

frequency_errors.description: Current measurement errors at each frequency

usable_bandwidth.description: Frequency bandwidth with acceptable current measurement accuracy
